resources.string: Get rid of your old Bahi-Khata. Opt for new digital & forever Bahi-Khata
Send updates of transactions to customers and maintain a transparent & happy bond
Use on multiple devices. Setup app lock & Download backup without worrying about loosing data
Forget the stress of door to door collection, Use payment reminders to collect dues & save time!
An OTP will be send on the mentioned mobile number to verify the user
Your OTP will be delivered soon on
Profile name will be visible to your customer
